text: I normally always pick dress up to shop in its close to my house and it’s somewhere me and my daughter both love. We have always had a wonderful experience but today not so much. Today my daughter and her friend decided we’d do some shopping and eating while they had their “big girl” lunch together I walked two stores down to dress up and decided I’d look for her a cute dress while they had their time together to chat! Found the cutest two dresses and proceeded to the check to ask if I could leave them there for ten mins while I walk literally two stores down. I’ve done this time and time before we always eat at the local restaurant connected to the strip mall. I was quickly told NO sorry we can’t hold anything. I was a little shocked and explained she was two doors down and I wanted to make sure they were a good fit due to them being final sale. The two looked at each other and said sorry because you can go online 24 hours and order we aren’t allowed to hold anything. Now if I’d previously not held something before maybe I’d believe them. One proceeded to say I’ll put it in the fitting room and we can just say she’s waiting on the fitting room!! Which means YOUR HOLDING IT. I smiled and told them that was ok and walked out needless to say I will only order from online or if I see the manager ( can’t remeber her name but she’s awesome) I’ll only shop then. These two youngsters possible need a lesson on customer service!!!

text: My daughter ordered 7 bridesmaids dresses from Promenade over 3 months before the wedding. Several girls lived out of state. They only had one dress of each style to choose from and no way to try on the correct size for each girl. They buy their their dresses from china and if you have ever ordered any clothing from there, you would know that they do not use american sizes.  Anyway, the dresses were supposed to be in at least 6 weeks before the wedding. The dresses never came in and we had less than 2 weeks before the wedding.  In a panic my daughter went to David's Bridal and she found a way more beautiful  dress that complemented all the girls. They put a rush on it and they came in in one week! They altered them in 2 days, all seven and was ready days before the wedding! I had to call 3 times, over 3 weeks to get my refund back from promenade. Save yourself the trouble and go to Huntsville Davids Bridal for a stress free  experience!

name: Laura Parker
text:
We went a couple months before prom looking for a dress and we found my dress but all we needed was some small alterations done to it. So we went another day for the alterations to be pinned back and everything. About a month before prom we called up there to know if I dress had been altered. They said no they do it by the dates of prom no matter how early you bought the dress. So of course we ask when our dress will be done they said we would be lucky to get it the week before but definitely the week of. Then we get the dress and it was messed up lucky we knew someone that could fix the problem on short notice.

Personally if I was anyone else I would only buy whats in the store but take it somewhere else for alterations. And try to pay for it all at once so you don’t have to deal with them longer than you need to.

name: Ashley Bolt
text:
I hate to have to write this, but I feel the need to warn other brides about the service I received at Promenade. I would not recommend Promenade for any bridal services, especially bridesmaids dresses. I ordered dresses for my three bridesmaids about 5 months prior to my wedding. The manufacturer estimated a ship date about 6 weeks prior to my wedding. To make a long story short, the dresses never came in.

For more details, read below, but the bottom line is that I would take my business elsewhere in the future, and I recommend that others do the same. The consultants in the store were very nice and helpful, but it's not worth the headache of dealing with Promenade's lack of good communication skills. I guess they missed the lesson in business school that the customer is always right.

When the dresses did not arrive in time for my wedding, they did offer us dresses from another source that were in stock. However, the sizes that my bridesmaids needed were not available. All three of my bridesmaids lived out of town, so having Promenade alter a larger dress down a size was not a feasible option for me, even though the store suggested altering dresses THEN shipping to the bridesmaids. I felt that anyone who knows anything would realize this option was crazy on a timeline of 10 days before the wedding. What were we going to do if the dresses were altered, shipped, and arrived 5 days before the wedding, and still didn't fit?

So about 10 days before my wedding, I ordered replacement dresses from David's Bridal and paid for overnight shipping. I'll admit that the fact that the original dresses never came in may have been the dress manufacturer's fault, but Promenade did not handle the situation well. The owner did not return phone calls when my mother or I would leave messages at the store, and she did not check the status of the supposed shipment as early or as often as I would have liked.

I requested that the store reimburse me for the cost of the replacement dresses that the girls did not want or even like, but they refused. I sent an email to the owner with the invoices for these dresses, and never heard another word about it until I sent another email, waited 10 days, received no response, and then called the store to follow up.

I don't want to sound like another jaded bride, but the truth is that there are plenty of other local businesses that do a better job of communicating with their customers and valuing customer satisfaction.

text: I really didn't care for Promenade. I was hesitant about going here because a friend had bought her daughter's prom dress here for $700 and it literally fell apart every time she moved; the material and stitching were substandard and would rip and come unraveled. Her senior prom was ruined since she was afraid to move and she left early in tears. Her calls were never returned and completely ignored by the owner. My daughter wanted to look anyway. We didn't find a huge selection, and the one dress my daughter liked had sequins missing and coming off the back; the stitching was loose. Not to mention we didn't find much of anything under $500. The girl was very helpful and accomodating, very friendly, and helped us with suggestions. We bought elsewhere however.

name: Traci Guy
text: I am usually a pretty easy going girl who doesn't complain, but I would like to share an experience with Promenade in Tuscumbia, AL with everyone so you can be informed before attempting to use their services. One of my dearest friends is getting married 2 weeks from tomorrow. The other 2 bridesmaids and I ordered our dresses back in December and were assured they would arrive 12 weeks from the time of order. The last dress was ordered December 29th. I called toward the end of March to check on my dress since I needed to make arrangements to get from Tuscaloosa to Tuscumbia for pick up. I was assured at that time the dress would ship on April 13 and arrive at their store in 7 to 10 business days. I called back on April 26th to check on the status of the dress. I was told at that time the that the dresses would be in early this week. I called yesterday and was told the dresses were at the UPS hub in Muscle Shoals and were left off the truck for the delivery and the owner did not have time to go get the dresses. I was assured at that time that the dresses would be in Friday morning and I could pick mine up Saturday with no issue. Friday rolled around and to no ones surprise, the dresses did not arrive. We were again assured the dresses would arrive Monday (less than 2 weeks from the wedding). Call me a skeptic, but I have lost ALL TRUST in this business. We have now come up with a back up plan to have dresses here the week of the wedding from another company. The bride and other 2 bridesmaids have made numerous calls to this business and also been given the run around. Had we not taken matters into our own hands, I am not convinced we would have any dresses for the wedding. I wanted to put this information out there so others can avoid this unnecessary stress and hardship my friends and I have gone through. We are now working with them to get our money back and to no ones surprise we are being given the run around yet again.

text: Highly recommend Kelsey! We had a wonderful experience with her and my daughter found the perfect dress! She went above and beyond to make this a fun special day.

text: I had a great experience working with Bella Couture! Jen specifically was so amazing through the entire process. She was very professional, helpful, extremely personable, and went above and beyond to assist me in any way she could. Highly recommend them!

name: Vivian Brown Cunningham
text:
Bella Couture has a wonderful selection of gowns. I had a great experience at my first appointment. A very nice, young lady, who was engaged herself, assisted me. She let me try on the dresses I had picked and delivered the style of dresses I was looking for. She was very accommodating to my mother and sister who I had brought with me. We found my dress and I could not have been happier with that first visit. We had a glass of champagne after we decided on it and it was a lovely enjoyable visit.
The owner was there and she was helpful and kind as well. When she saw that I was really leaning towards one, she stepped in and let me know what alterations could be made and we ended up changing the neckline a little bit.
When I went to pick up my dress, we had a different experience. In addition to my mother and sister, I brought a couple of friends along to see me in it. I walked in first, and told the lady at the desk that I had an appointment to pick up my dress. She then began to walk back towards the dressing rooms. I didn't follow her at first because 1. she didn't tell me to and 2. my friends and family weren't all inside the shop yet. When I did take a few steps towards where she went, I saw she had turned around and looked annoyed that I had not followed her.
I put on the dress and she assisted me. After I was in it, I had to ask her if I could go show my friends.
By the time I got out and we looked over my dress, my sister and mother had already noticed how unpleasant the girl helping me was. She made us feel like we were a bother to her.
I enjoyed my first experience tremendously. My second was not so pleasant. The shop is wonderful as long as you do not get the grumpy girl. I wish I had caught her name, but she wasn't friendly enough to tell me and I was too scared of her to ask. I would and do recommend this shop. Hopefully the unpleasant girl has become more friendly.

name: Julia Elaine
text: Love love love this shop.  The most beautiful dresses and kind people!  I am not one who feels comfortable with things trying on clothes and showing people, so I definitely was nervous about wedding dress shopping! Maddie was great helping me pick a dress.  Colleen altered my dress to look exactly how I pictured it and was so patient with me.  The shop itself is beautiful and spacious!

name: kera h
text: I had a great experience at Bella Couture! My consultant went above and beyond to find me my dream dress. I wasn’t fully sure what I wanted, but after telling her some of the things I liked, she pulled out a dress for me that I instantly fell in love with! The rest of the staff was also very friendly. I highly recommend shopping here for your dream dress! You definitely won’t be disappointed.

name: Roya DUNN
text: Very satisfied with the service and variety . Very helpful. I was able to find my perfect dress the very first day I started dress shopping and belle couture was the very first place I visited and only after trying on 2 dresses I found my dream wedding dress. !!!!! ....it was amazing

text: Bella Couture is absolutely amazing!! They are so patient and so helpful. They really want you to find the perfect dress. Everyone should make this their first stop in buying their bridal gown!

text: I love everything about this place! The employees are so sweet, and their gown selection is gorgeous!

name: maria miles
text: Although I did not leave with a dress (at least not yet) I had a wonderful experience at Bella Couture! Everyone made it easy and enjoyable. My mother, sisters and I felt comfortable and under no pressure. I would definitely recommend to any bride!

text: Jen made the day incredible for me. I wasn't expecting to find my dress that day, but with Jen's talent, she found me my dream dress after we realized I wanted something totally different than I originally thought. She found the dress that made me feel like a beautiful bride.

text: Love Colleen, the owner, and her staff! They truly care about you and about making sure your BIG day is perfect! You cannot go wrong trusting these amazing ladies with your important dress decision.

name: Lori Knarr
text: Bella Couture has beautiful dresses and an absolutely wonderful staff. Leah and Colleen (I think I'm spelling their names right) were super helpful and made my first stop in the dress shopping trip was a very pleasant experience.

name: Leah
text: Bella Couture is absolutely amazing!! I spent over three hours trying on dresses and Carol was exceptionally encouraging and honest about each one. She helped me in and out of every dress and never lost patience with me, even when I wanted to try on the last few two or three more times. I ended up with the dress of my dreams from Bella Couture!! I went in with a pretty tight budget, but Carol was not swayed by that and let us look and was super helpful anyway. I ended up spending more than I anticipated I would, but I couldnt' be happier with my purchase! I also purchased all of my bridesmaids' dresses here. Carol stayed in touch with me throughout my entire wedding planning process letting me know any updates that came up. And when I asked her for about 100 different swatches for bridesmaids dresses, she provided every one. The atmosphere is extremely comfortable and relaxed and inviting. It is such a beautiful boutique with a huge selection, and I am so excited to have found my dress here!

name: Rhonda Lusco
text: Outstanding bridal shop!

name: Dawn Emerson
text:
I LOVED going to Bella Couture to get my wedding gown!!!! Carol was absolutely amazing, as was all of the ladies at the salon. She made the experience exciting and relaxing. I tried on dresses for over 5 hours and not one time did she ever seem tired of working with me or frustrated about me making a decision. She was a lot of fun and it made the entire experience enjoyable. To be honest I was at a bit of a loss going through the racks and picking dresses to try on, but Carol figured me out quite quickly and I followed her around as she suggested dresses for me to try on.
She also helped my mom find a beautiful dress as well. While I have only just ordered my dress, I know that this business genuinely cares about the customer and their services outside of just "here is your dress" make this quite evident as well. I would recommend anyone to go there, it is definitely worth it!!

name: Ja'Lissa Williams
text: CoCo is amazing!! She’s an angel sent from God. Her shop is beautiful. I found my dream dress at her shop. CoCo & the staff made my family and I feel so welcome & loved from the moment we arrived. Make sure you stop by Bella’s Couture if you’re looking for a one of a kind couture dress with top notch service. You will be blessed. CoCo is now known as Momma CoCo to me. I absolutely love her. ❤️

name: Melanie Hinson
text: This place has a great variety of dresses and an incredibly nice staff! Madi helped me; she must be able to read minds because I loved every single one of the dresses she pulled!!! Not a single negative thing about this place.

name: Randi Doherty
text: I don’t know where to start! I had an appt. with them on a day where it snowed around 3 inches... they stayed open just for me!! Once I got there they never made me feel like I was inconveniencing them and never gave me the impression that they wished they were home enjoying the snow or a day off like most other people were getting to do. I found my dream dress and was there for over 2 hours and I never once felt rushed by them!! I can’t express my gratitude and appreciation in words! Thank you so much Bella Couture!! :)

name: Golden Reeves
text: Absolutely loved every part of my experience at Bella Couture! My consultant, Sydney, was extremely sweet and helpful! And they had a huge selection to choose from. 10/10 would recommend!

name: Katie B
text: Fabulous experience at Bella Couture! I highly recommend this bridal salon! Excellent dress selection, prices, and service1

name: Christine Jones
text: Absolutely beautiful dresses with the widest selection I have seen in Birmingham! They carry very unique designers which was perfect for what kind of dress I was looking for. If you’re wanting a unique and stunning dress, highly recommended... if you’re wanting the perfect bridal experience then I’d never walk in the door. Other shops in Birmingham absolutely blow them out of the water when it comes to customer service and creating a bridal experience. My consultant didn’t really say much to me throughout the entire appointment and I did not feel welcome in the slightest. It’s not going to be the tell me about your fiancé and your wedding and about you experience that you get at other salons. If another salon had carried this designer I would’ve have bought my dress somewhere else for sure, but no one else carried the dress so they got my business despite my less than bridal experience.

name: Amanda Klein
text:
I can't say enough good things about Bella Couture! This place should be a must for every bride looking for their perfect gown!

As soon as I arrived at Bella Couture I, along with my mother and future mother-in-law, were warmly welcomed by Carol whom took us through the store explaining to us the way gowns were organized (by designer and price). She knew that I was on a strict budget and made sure to show me what gowns were on sale and how I could get the best pricing. We discussed what style of gown I was interested in (lace, low back, fitted) and began gathering multiple gowns that fit the style of dress I was looking for---and let me just say, that this store as an AMAZING selection of gowns!

Carol helped me with getting into gowns and out of them and was upmost respectful during that whole process. She was very devoted into finding a gown that I loved and that was in my price range. At no point was I pressured to get a more expensive dress or even to purchase a dress that day---which I found quite refreshing, as I like to think about big purchases for a few days! However, what she did once I found "the dress" was just above and beyond! My mom and mother-in-law came up to the platform to see the dress up close... Carol quietly grabbed my mom's camera and started taking multiple pictures of them looking at me in the dress and of us hugging! I now have all of these amazing photos of this amazing experience that I would have never had without Carol! My entire experience was like this, they went above and beyond anything I could have imagined!

We were all so very impressed with the entire staff and the overall store. Amazing dresses at all price points and amazing customer service....you will NOT be disappointed!

So STOP thinking about possibly making an appointment and call them....NOW!

name: Natalie McVey Gossett
text: I was kinda disappointed with Bella Couture. My consultant Emily was the sweetest thing ever and so helpful! But I just felt like that weren't many variety of dresses. Also, it felt a bit awkward to walk across the store from the dressing room to show my family in the waiting area. I had to keep walking behind another bride who was at one mirror showing her family a dress to get to the one they had for me to use. It just wasn't a very intimate setting and I had random strangers giving me opinions on the dresses I tried on. Just not the experience I was hoping for when looking for a wedding dress.

name: Lindsay Norris
text: I LOVE Bella Couture!!! I came by myself and instantly had a family here! Kim and Rachel were so wonderful and helped me find my dream dress which I had no idea what it was!! I couldn't have had a better experience!

text: The best bridal store and staff ever. I love my dress! I love this store. Ms. Colleen and her staff are amazing.

name: Amanda Olive
text: I said YES to the dress today!!!! Thank you so much to the sweet staff at Bella Couture that helped make my day magical!:) I felt like a princess in my dress! I can't wait to marry my fiancé and look so good doing it;)

name: Georgia Tudisco
text: I LOVE THIS PLACE.  THE OWNER AND STAFF ARE AWESOME.  LOVE THEM.  GREAT SELECTION..

name: Stephanie Nelson
text: While choosing my dress from Bella Couture, they were beyond helpful.  However, I felt that the moment I had ordered my dress they didn't care.  It took 10 months for my dress to come in.  I was told it would take up to 9.  When I called to check on it, they said they would let me know.  I had to call 3 different times to see where my dress was.  When I FINALLY got an answer and a new arrival date, they text it to me.  I drove 2 hours from Huntsville, where I live to try my dress on.  It had a 8 foot train and was a wrinkled mess.  I did not feel special trying on my wedding dress.  I didn't even really want to take pictures in it because it was so wrinkled.  When I came back to pick my dress up for my wedding I tried to make an appointment so my maid of honor who was coming from 4 hours away could come with me.  They said no need to call ahead weeks in advance and wouldn't schedule me an appointment.  When my maid of honor and I set a date and I called even days before the recommended "3 days" they told me they couldn't get me in.  I had to pick my wedding dress up completely alone.  I reminded them I would like them to make sure my dress was steamed properly so I could actually see what it looked like.  When I arrived for my appointment, they had just started to steam it...I had to sit by myself and waited 45 mins to try on my sort of steamed dress.  It just felt that once they had my money, they couldn't have made my experience less generic and unimportant.  Wish I would have gotten my bridal gown in Nashville where I got my designer bridesmaid dresses.

text: Everyone at Bella Couture was extremely nice, patient, and accommodating. If you're looking for formal wear, I definitely recommend making an appointment here.

name: Tom Dowling
text:
My sister is getting married on the 27th of this month.. That's three days away. Everything has gone pretty smoothly, not a ton of stress, and no bridezilla moments, but of course, every smooth trip needs a little storm. My sister ordered her dress from Bella Couture in Birmingham, they seemed helpful enough with picking it out and promised alterations would be done promptly. Up til yesterday, the alterations hadn't been done. Now you might be thinking "well, wedding dresses are tricky to fix in a short amount of time.." , no. It was a simple hem job, and they had six weeks to do it. Six weeks for a simple hem job. And up til yesterday it wasn't done. Fine, alright, you're busy, we get that. But giving her the run around with phonecalls, and promises and then having the audacity to say that my sister is "hysterical" and flat out lying about what you've failed to do, and then charging an extra 550$ on a wedding dress that was already paid for, for simple alterations that weren't even done in the allotted amount of time is disgusting. Oh, story's not done yet, they still won't give her the dress.
So if you're looking to get married anytime soon, don't go to Bella Couture. Despicable service, from a bunch of petty thieves.

name: Ashley JoJo Moore
text: Chloe's has a ton of dress options to choose from. Not just for women and teen girls but also for our little ones. The smallest size I saw was 6 months which is great for those pageant mom's and dads with young children, like myself. The dresses were beautiful and came in different lengths, sizes, and styles so there should be no issue of anyone finding something they want. It's great that they also have a rental option because formal dresses can get expensive if purchasing. There is also a good amount of parking in front and on the side of the store. The Customer Service was excellent even when there was a rush of customers in the store. There was quality attention given to everyone which I'm sure was nice to see and feel. I'd highly recommend this store for any of your formal needs.

name: Dani Cakes
text:
My son, who is kind of shy, had a school dance coming up so we were in need of a suit. We didn’t know where to start and neither my son nor I had any confidence in what to even look at.
When we walked in, Malcolm headed straight for us and instantly took us under his wing. He patiently spent close to an hour helping my son find the right fit, the right color (for his skin tone) and to match his date’s dress. We found everything we needed except for the tie. We were so very pleased with the purchase we made. But the most important thing we left with, was my son’s confidence! Malcolm told my son “to stand up straight, lift your head up, and be confident in the good looking guy that he is”
As a mom, to a shy teenage boy,  this means the world to me!
When we left to go find the tie at a different store, we were totally lost again. My son said “mom, do you think we can go get Malcolm to help us?” They may not ever see each other again but this guy with the exceptional customer service skills made a LIFELONG impact on my son. Express, I hope you realize how great of an employee you have in Malcolm. I wish the world was filled with more Malcolms.

She was wearing shorts and a tee-shirt because it's easier to try on clothes. She was completely ignored. The salespeople greeted and engaged in conversation every lady who was dressed up or seemed to be known to them to help them find things. My wife was looking for a particular item and they were no help. Even after my wife approached one of the sales clerks she didn't offer to help. They even ignored an elderly lady in a wheelchair. As an old retail manager, I found that level of elitism appalling. So the moral of the story is, if you don't care if salespeople are rude, this is the place for you. But if you need help finding something or you want to be treated courteously, then stay away from this place.
